Text:
This show seems to have promise of being good. I can certainly relate to feeling ostracized by family and friends for converting from a dogmatic religion to a more well rounded Buddhist philosophy.


Namaste
thanks EZTV for the upload, and thanks to everybody posting those links, otherwise i'd have no idea what i'm dl'ing... :)
I wonder who will watch that crap.

@dzlrules.... um, you do realize that this show is sending up the half-baked morons who believe that they've tapped into "The Truth."  I hope you're not seeing this as an affirmation of what you've gone thru.  If so, then you're the punchline.

Namaste back at you.
Thanks, EZ! We need more shows that present alternative and evolved thinking that both bucks conformity AND blows the mainstream fodder away. Peace!
Excellent job "EZTV" Thank you! keep eem coming more please:)
